relationships.description: Harry is aware that the Chamber of Secrets has been opened.
Ron suggests getting out of the room where Mrs Norris is hanging.
Harry wants to help Mrs Norris, but Ron advises against it.
Ron advises Harry not to try and help Mrs Norris.
